name: Island for Future
description:
Welcome to "Island for Future",

the main goal of this game is to keep away those bad Capitalists. They are trying to conquer your Island.

Place Trees to Gain Points. With those Points you can buy other cool stuff and let me tell you, those capitalists will not be amused.

Further Details in the Game.

Yours Sincerely Mother Nature

*Pro-Tip* Always Buy a Palm-Forest first!

Good Luck!

PB; 1240 Nature Points
